verses.name: Luke 17:1
verses.text: Then said he unto the disciples, It is impossible but that offences will come: but woe unto him, through whom they come!

verses.name: Luke 17:2
verses.text: It were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck, and he cast into the sea, than that he should offend one of these little ones.

verses.name: Luke 17:3
verses.text: Take heed to yourselves: If thy brother trespass against thee, rebuke him; and if he repent, forgive him.

verses.name: Luke 17:4
verses.text: And if he trespass against thee seven times in a day, and seven times in a day turn again to thee, saying, I repent; thou shalt forgive him.
